column2: Sac'd due to breathing issues. T1 - base of tail; T2 - liver tumor and what appeared to be a tumor in the pelvis near gonads
Sac'd due to breathing issues. T1 - base of tail; T2 - liver tumor and what appeared to be a tumor in the pelvis near gonads
Lung nodules present in chest cavity - and in the surrounding parietal pleura.
Tumor at base of tail not collected
Liver tumor and tumor in pelvis collected and fixed in same conical. There shouldn't be a problem distinguishing which tumor is which when grossing.
